snippet: Peyton Manning made Denver the first stop of his free-agent tour Friday, and the Broncos are said to be a serious contender for his services.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants release running back Brandon Jacobs in a money-saving move; other NFL news noted. Photo (M)7
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning made Denver the first stop of his free-agent tour Friday, and the Broncos are said to be a serious contender for his services.

headline.main: Peyton Manning Visits With Denver Broncos
